Kenny - May 26, 2012 - Version 2.4.1
Great app and Dev
The app works sweet on my Tbolt. Max is extremely helpful. He went above and beyond trying to help me with a problem. Turns out I just needed a new phone. Max spent 2 days emailing back and forth trying to get it up and running. Awesome support. Thanks Max

Dana - May 28, 2012 - Version 2.4.1
App and Developer.... Truly Amazing

The app has been installed and seems to be all that was described, and more. Highly recommend to those that are S-on and tired of having to fastboot new ROMs

Awesome

He responded to my first email within a matter of 20 minutes and to say the least was awesome. I have a custom ROM and rooted phone with only taking up around 3 hours of my day. The help is great and the app is great also. You won't be disappointed, buy this app.

I tihnk it only affects the naming of the backup file? If I can't find my backup on the SD card, I will get a refund from GooglePlay
